column2: they saw a light in a house. They agreed to go and ask for a place to sleep. They went to the house and knocked. The door opened and they went in. The young men didn't see anyone. But they heard a voice greeting them. The voice said
column3: "I am a louse. Open the metal pot and have food. Open the earthenware pot and drink amahewu." Then the louse put on its skin and went out. The young men ate
column5: and gave thanks. Then they left the house. As they left
column6: they had a bad thought. They said
column8: it couldn't have happened that we had food from a louse." Eventually they agreed to go back and crush the louse. They went back to the house and crushed the louse. Suddenly the louse was gone
column9: and the house disappeared! They found themselves outside in the open.
